entry.title: KYOGO SNUB
entry.summary: CELTIC striker Kyogo Furuhashi has been snubbed by Japan ahead of next month’s World Cup double-header. entry.title: Why are we setting up on Substack?
entry.summary: There's two types of subscription over on substack and both will get fresh new content emailed directly to their inbox or available on the Substack app - it's just that one will be premium and paid for and one is free. (also - that’s the minimum substance subscription fee.)
